channel.title: Pk-alive new vps 24/7 1st pking server spawnable with customs
channel.description:
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/202115212/cooltext1145585993.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/202115212/Screenshot_1%20%283%29.png[/img] COME NOW WE HAVE CUSTOM WHIPS ALOT OF STUFF WELL BE ADDED THERES DICE FOR STUFF AND DONATOR VPS 24/7 Webclient:[url=http://pk-alive.net]http://pk-alive.net[/url] Download Client:[url=http://pk-alive.net/home/client.jar]http://pk-alive.net/home/client.jar[/url] VERSION:317 OLDSCHOOL PK 100& switching 100% godsword specails 100% dragon claws pkp shop with cool rares(NEW KOSRI SWORD ADDED NO SPECAIL ATTACK BUT STR 150) PC SHOP MINIGAMES:FOR NOW ONLY PEST CONTROL & FIGH CAVES 100% veng 100% pking shops Commands for free players for now: ::commands ::master ::veng ::pure and more 100% cool fourms with chat for the register only we use alot of stuff 100% cool funpk even in minigame areas and alot of places to make at hard
Why should I join?
Why shouldn't you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! Pk-Alive is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what! The server is packed with content, and this server is not buggy! There are professional staffs on this server that will always help you. The second you log in, you can automatically PK. You can gear up in less than 20 seconds here on Pk-Alive! There is no lag on this server, and this server is 24/7. This server is based on PKing and staking. You don't have to be good at it! You can learn it all here on Pk-Alive. So what are you waiting for! Click the "WebSite Url" button at the top of this thread!
Features
Professional Staff Team. Staff team are all mature, non-abusive, active and dedicated 20mb cache Flawless PKing. PK to your hearts content! Gear up in less than 30 seconds 100% Rocktail and Overload effects. 2006 PK Oldschool Zone 100% Magic, which includes Lunar spells, ancient spells and normal spells Perfect Switching - Hybrid/Tribrid as you please PKP shop, that holds many items that are special! Fully working Duel Arena - stake your rare items! Do ::Commands for free commands , as well as Master, Pure, and more check in game No lag, and the server is 24/7! Strong VPS! Custom Capes for the donators with special effects; Dragon, Water and Earth Cape, each with bonuses. Imbued Rings; Warrior Ring(i), Berserker Ring (i), Archer Ring(i) and Seers Ring(i) Webclient and a Downloadable Client! FunPK - a place where you can PK as much as you want, without losing your items!! All Set Effects work (e.g. Dharoks Set) x1 and x10 hits, as well as Zoom in and Zoom out buttons! in the client only soon webclient

Why should I join?

Why shouldn’t you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! Pk-Alive is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what!
